job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Ready to leverage your mastery of LLMs to drive productivity? At Trilogy, we're opening doors to an exceptional tech career, welcoming those who've honed their AI skills to elevate their expertise in a dynamic environment. We're offering a rare chance where your primary focus will be to further expand your proficiency in LLMs.

   What you will be doing

     * Designing and building high-quality AI automations to streamline processes, enhance productivity, and deliver robust, scalable solutions across diverse applications
     * Experimenting with state-of-the-art AI tools like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, integrating them into our developmental process to assess and enhance their utility
     * Evaluating and optimizing the implementation of AI solutions across various infrastructures, including AWS, to ensure seamless performance and integration, Architecting and deploying sophisticated, fully-automated AI systems that require zero human intervention for a truly scalable impact
job_details.full_text:
Artificial Intelligence Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Ready to leverage your mastery of LLMs to drive productivity? At Trilogy, we're opening doors to an exceptional tech career, welcoming those who've honed their AI skills to elevate their expertise in a dynamic environment. We're offering a rare chance where your primary focus will be to further expand your proficiency in LLMs.

   What you will be doing

     * Designing and building high-quality AI automations to streamline processes, enhance productivity, and deliver robust, scalable solutions across diverse applications
     * Experimenting with state-of-the-art AI tools like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, integrating them into our developmental process to assess and enhance their utility
     * Evaluating and optimizing the implementation of AI solutions across various infrastructures, including AWS, to ensure seamless performance and integration, Architecting and deploying sophisticated, fully-automated AI systems that require zero human intervention for a truly scalable impact

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes leveraging LLMs, designing and building AI automations, and integrating state-of-the-art AI tools like GPT-4 Vision. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer focused on language and vision models.

phrases: mastery of LLMs
further expand your proficiency in LLMs
Designing and building high-quality AI automations
Experimenting with state-of-the-art AI tools like GPT-4 Vision
integrating them into our developmental process to assess and enhance their utility
Evaluating and optimizing the implementation of AI solutions
Architecting and deploying sophisticated, fully-automated AI systems
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate direct work with generative models (LLMs), experimentation with specific AI tools (GPT-4 Vision), and the development/optimization of AI solutions, which are core to the Modeling task in GenAI.

phrases: build high-quality AI automations to streamline processes, enhance productivity, and deliver robust, scalable solutions across diverse applications
integrating them into our developmental process
ensure seamless performance and integration
deploying sophisticated, fully-automated AI systems
job_tasks.justification: The description focuses on building and integrating AI into applications, ensuring scalability and performance, and deploying systems, which are key aspects of software development in the context of AI.

phrases: deliver robust, scalable solutions
Evaluating and optimizing the implementation of AI solutions across various infrastructures
ensure seamless performance and integration
Architecting and deploying sophisticated, fully-automated AI systems
job_tasks.justification: Phrases related to scalability, optimization across infrastructures, seamless integration, and deployment of automated systems point towards the operational aspects of managing AI in production.

phrases: drive productivity
streamline processes
enhance productivity
job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly mentions goals like driving productivity and streamlining processes, indicating an understanding of how AI solutions contribute to business objectives.
